feed.title: mehsen
feed.subtitle: mehing on a varity of matters

entry.title: Back, in style
entry.summary: It’s been a while since I practiced free writing. And not-so-coincidentally It’s been the same while since my last exam. The struggle is real people!

entry.title: Mightier
entry.summary:
The pen is mightier than the sword. —Edward Bulwer-Lytton
Sure. But on top of that I believe:
The pencil is mightier than the pen. —me

entry.title: Sleep on it
entry.summary:
I’m starting to realize that good things don’t get made in one sitting. They take time over several sessions. Leaving for a day and revising your work makes all the difference between mediocre and extraordinary.
Also having someone around, even if they

entry.title: Late night crazy
entry.summary: Or how my sudden obsession with writing came to be

entry.title: For when I’m bored
entry.summary:
“I’m bored.”
We all said it at some point. Some like me more than others. And yet there are so many undone tasks, or things you wanted to do when you were busy and didn’t had the time.

entry.title: Tired
entry.summary: It’s a special kind of tired. The only way I managed to describe the feeling was “I don’t wanna sleep; I want to die”.
